attributes.action: Wrongful arrest -Unlawful arrest and police abuse of authority (corruption)
attributes.additional_details:
I need an answer and explanation.  Other than the complaint procedures please.
I am very disappointed and will not be a target for police officers who provide Total pleasing instead of total policing to corrupt trustees in a Muslim place of public worship because I have exposed so many crimes and irregularities in the way they manage the charity. I was unlawfully arrested and taken to the station  and while in custody I was arrested again because the first arrest had nothing to rely on so the second arrest was a joke because there was no name of a victim or any information or statement taken from the alleged victim.
So I was arrested while in custody for nothing.

rejection.details: This e-petition cannot be published as you have not specified the action that you would like the Government to take.
